control.description-key: This controls lets you fetch data from your cosmos db database

property.name: masterKey
property.description-key: Here goes your Master Key of your CosmosDB

property.name: endpoint
property.description-key: Here goes the Url of your CosmosDB

property.name: dataBase
property.description-key: Here goes your Data Base of your CosmosDB

property.name: container
property.description-key: Here goes the container name of your CosmosDB data base

property.name: partition
property.description-key: Here goes the primary key of your CosmosDB

property.name: query
property.description-key: Here goes the Query to fetch the data

property.name: condition1
property.description-key: Here put your condition (Text or Numeric) for the {0} value of your query

property.name: condition2
property.description-key: Here put your condition (Text or Numeric) for the {1} value of your query

property.name: condition3
property.description-key: Here put your condition (Text or Numeric) for the {2} value of your query
